q.para: Q: Can I purchase tickets on-site?

a.para: A: Yes, tickets can be purchased on-site at our box office, accessible through our 50th St. entrance or through the concourse of 30 Rockefeller Plaza.

q.para: Q: Do I have to stand in line if there is not an available timeslot when I purchase on-site?

a.para: A: Once you purchase your ticket at the ticket counter, you can leave then return at your designated time slot. Lines are a waste of your valuable time. There is so much for you to enjoy in Rockefeller Center and Midtown Manhattan, we wouldnï¿½t want you to miss any of that by standing in a line instead.

q.para: Q: What are the hours of operation for the box-office?
